system.requirements: Not Astropath, Explorator, Ork, or Kroot. RT Rank 1+, <10 Corruption.
system.descriptionText: The Character becomes Devoted to and pledges their life to the teachings of Saint Drusius. Marching into the fray of battle with knowledge that to die in glory is to be blessed as worthy.
system.effects:
Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Drusian Adherent
If taken at Rank 1, Replaces Rank 1 Advances as normal, but character still has their normal starting skills, talents, etc, All talents in this advance list are completely separate.
Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Skill Scholastic Lore (Drusian Chronicles)
